entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
